channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
As @GeorgeLakoff says -- I vote values not self-interest. I don't need a lot of the services I think the govt should fund. I have my education but I think we should spend more on that. Same with making sure people have enough to eat and a place to live. https://t.co/jFEMCquBGT
I don't believe in heaven and hell, and i don't think it's our place to judge others. If we can afford to make sure everyone is provided for, we should do it, and quit worrying about whether someone got more help than you. They didn't. And who cares.
the problem is a lot of *really* rich people only vote their supposed self-interest. they're making a mistake. they don't need any help from the government. they should enjoy their wealth and stop worrying about what poor people do. they aren't gods. not immortal or omniscient.

@joshelman @radoshi But think about it this way, it's a much smaller investment and less risky than the Hail Mary they're doing trying to turn Facebook into a metaverse. This would almost be a bankable thing, it's like opening a starbucks. Everyone knows the idea works now.
The Knicks say "Yeah give me some of that." https://t.co/Kv5iwuzSsB

I don't believe in ultimatums but if the Knicks sign Kyrie Irving, I will never forgive them. For crying out loud, they were swept in the first round. What kind of idiocracy says "Yeah give me some of that."
@joshelman true.
@joshelman they should just create new systems that share an identity system with facebook. follow the model of instagram, seems to have worked great.
@soapdog i like that.

An idea for a new NBA superteam. 1. KD 2. Russell Westbrook 3. James Harden 4. Melo 5. Dame 6. Kemba. A truly epic team for the ages. If there were an NBA team in Pittsburgh, I'd say that's where they should play. Otherwise Sacramento or Orlando.

@TommyBeer KD did the NBA a favor by leaving Golden State.
@TommyBeer he was too tall.
A magnificent story in a tweet. https://t.co/TRGftuqzSu
Can We Develop a Covid-19 Vaccine That Lasts? https://t.co/U3m7Mvrnr0
Liz Cheneyâ€™s condemnation of Trumpâ€™s lies wins over Democrats. https://t.co/Wq1NGdLi1B
Beatles songs that John Lennon hated. https://t.co/Dx7DKbZQXm
Stephen Curryâ€™s Golden State Is the NBAâ€™s Newest Dynasty. https://t.co/I53Bwff9ZJ
@wgrosso a failed joke, i guess
@JamesSACorey therefore one can conclude they don't want a functioning society.
I don't love her politics, but what a cute kid. Oy. https://t.co/RmX9Ccy3vB

Wordle 365 1/6 ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©ðŸŸ©
Bing!
Dedicated to President Trump.
NBBs go first. If there's an NBB around you don't have to wait for a volunteer. https://t.co/6R38GrrHge
@jevon I don't think it was. My father was writing about outliners, he didn't make an outliner.

In 1987 my father, who was a professor at Pace University in NY, who loved my outliners, wrote an article about them in 1987 that today's #toolsforthought people would like. All I have are JPGs, so here goes.
https://t.co/RNqrTrGjJk
https://t.co/cvewlUfVqU
https://t.co/QVfPfcyp3p
https://t.co/d0yviaCmwE
https://t.co/7DCEy32u03
https://t.co/MPFE4aiOE0
https://t.co/eWCm3cLEqJ
https://t.co/lbicMEBuWB
My father was a real outliner user. You know them when you see them. They want to make lists and figure stuff out. Very much into concepts.
My mother on the other hand was a NBB or Natural-Born-Blogger. She always had something on her mind and had to tell the world about it.
So of course I, their first-born child, wrote outlining and blogging software, all together in one package.
My mother once said that I was a good investment. She thought that way too. ;-)

It's father's day. In 1987 my father, who was a professor at Pace University in NY, loved my outliners. He wrote an article about them in 1987 that I think today's #toolsforthought people would like. All I have are JPGs, so here goes. https://t.co/xXFvd1gKky
I imagine people will be able to make their own avatars or buy "third party avatars" without paying a royalty to Zuck. https://t.co/fiAHQv8u86
Why webcams arenâ€™t good enough. https://t.co/JGEW55Z66L
